head.title: Serverless - AWS Documentation
head.description: Serverless AWS Provider Documentation Welcome to the Serverless Amazon Web Services documentation!  Please select a section on the left toâ€¦

body:
### [Read this on the main serverless docs site](https://www.serverless.com/framework/docs/providers/aws/)

#Serverless AWS Provider Documentation

Welcome to the Serverless Amazon Web Services documentation! Please select a section on the left to get started.

Note: Before continuing AWS system credentials are required for using the CLI.

If you have questions, join the chat in gitter or post over on the forums
